name: Red Nights (Event Horizon School)
description:
Red Nights is set in the World of Darkness, the setting where vampires (who call themselves Kindred) are real and live hidden among us.

New York City, present day. Erina is a high-level member of the Camarilla, the secret society that rules over all Kindred. 

She goes in search of Charles DeAngelo, a retired human politician, kidnapped by a group of mercenaries and held hostage in an abandoned hotel.

Why does Erina care about DeAngelo? Who is behind DeAngelo’s kidnapping? The answers lie at the end of the game.

FEATURES LIST:

  • Complete your mission killing like a machine or sneaking in the shadows
  • Five different stages of an abandoned hotel to explore
  • Mercenaries hunting you
  • Environmental obstacles like turrets and UV light spotlights
  • Two endings depending on your playstyle
